items.sentence: Tom was really drunk last night. He probably didn't even know what he was saying.
Do you have something that you paid a lot of money for but have hardly ever used?
Even though Tom explained it in detail, I'm not sure that I really understand it.
Tom drove the first three hundred kilometers, and Mary drove the rest of the way.
The reason my parents don't like my boyfriend is because he didn't go to college.
Forks were used for many years in Europe and the Near East, but only for cooking.
I don't have time to go for a walk with you now, but I'll have time after dinner.
I bought a second badminton racket for myself, but I forgot to buy a shuttlecock.
Tom knew that Mary wasn't very likely to be able to do what she was trying to do.
I am sorry that I shall not be able to be with you at Christmas as I had planned.
